name: Scarecrow Slaughter 1999
description:
Pumpkin Patrick has grown tired of watching everyone eating his friends every fall season. But this year, the tables have turned. Escape Patrick's grasp in his Corn maze, A labyrinth full of scares and surprises whilst he chases close behind. Will you be able to escape before you become fertilizer for next years pumpkin patch?

 |  Created By: SoggySoup  In partnership with AquantaFilms and Squeaks D' Corgeh
